PerfectNetExp.abs: 协字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 协商〖 consult;talkthingsover〗 协同作用〖 synergism;synergeticeffect〗 协议〖 agreeon〗.
syneresis 脱水收缩synergism 协同酌synergist 协琢
1.增效作用一种激素可加强另一种激素的效应，此种现象称为激素的增效作用(synergism)。如生长素和赤霉素对于促进植物节间的伸长生长，表现为相互增效作用。IAA促进细胞核的分裂，而CTK促.
synergetic 合作的synergism 协合作用synergist 协合剂

means.word_mean: 1. the working together of two things (muscles or drugs for example) to produce an effect greater than the sum of their individual effects
